snippet: The owner of the popular Chelsea Market in Manhattan, which is planning to add office towers to its squat structure, first wants to expand by including eight new retail outlets.
abstract: Owner of the popular Chelsea Market in Manhattan, which is planning to add office towers to its squat structure, first wants to expand by including eight new retail outlets; original plans ignited public furor over changes to neighborhood landmark, but retail expansion will not involve any changes to exterior.
lead_paragraph: The owner of the popular Chelsea Market in Manhattan, which is planning to add office towers to its squat structure, first wants to expand by including eight new retail outlets.

headline.seo: Before Building Towers, a Manhattan Market Plans to Add Vendors
headline.main: Before Expanding Outside, Market Will Revamp Indoors
headline.print_headline: Before Expanding Outside, Market Will Revamp Indoors
